Name: Slime Story
About the game: Immerse yourself in the story passing through dangerous and exciting levels and locations! This unique game offer you many interesting and unusual mechanics, from drones and turrets to clever enemies with artificial intelligence! Go through the levels and try to beat the developer’s record of deaths, let's see how successfully you will be! We wish you good luck!
